Question: You have 8 VP (Catacombs = 6, Golden Statue = 2) and 3 Gold in pool. What single action this turn lets you hit 11 VP?
Answer: Use Golden Statue’s React to spend 3 Gold for +3 temporary VP.
Rationale: Statue grants +3 VP for 3 Gold, bringing total to 11.:contentReference[oaicite:60]{index=60}:contentReference[oaicite:61]{index=61}
game_state_description: Catacombs of the Dead with tokens; Golden Statue straightened; player pool 3 Gold.
